modelCorrections.rawOutput: - Thought: To address the color contrast issue and meet the WCAG 2.1 requirements, I need to adjust either the foreground or background color to achieve at least a 4.5:1 contrast ratio. This approach will maintain the integrity of the design while ensuring that the text is easily readable for users with visual impairments. - Corrected HTML: `Learn more`
